original_title: Carole King - Tapestry: Live in Hyde Park
overview: With the release of Tapestry in 1971, Carole King struck a chord with listeners around the world, earning four Grammy Awards and three Top 20 hits with her unforgettable album. "Tapestry: Live in Hyde Park," recorded in the summer of 2016, documents Carole's first British concert since 1989 and the first ever performance of this classic album in its entirety. The concert also includes even more classics written by Carole, plus a special guest appearance from the cast of the sensational BEAUTIFUL: The Carole King Musical.
tagline: Filmed on The Great Oak Stage at British Summer Time in Hyde Park on July 3rd, 2016
title: Carole King - Tapestry: Live in Hyde Park
